official_title: Resolution that the thanks of the House to the Honorable Carl Albert, Speaker of the House of Representatives.

summary.text: Expresses the thanks of the House of Representatives to the Honorable Carl Albert, Speaker of the House, for the able, impartial, and dignified manner in which he has presided over the deliberations and performed the arduous duties of the Chair during the present session of Congress.

titles.title: Resolution that the thanks of the House to the Honorable Carl Albert, Speaker of the House of Representatives.
